languages.text: "Ууу... Мурашки по коже от этих жутких фигур. Эй, вы слышите? Они еще и разговаривают! Они... оно... Ай, эта штука живая! Прочь, прочь из моей головы!"

traits.locale_text: "Ууу... Мурашки по коже от этих жутких фигур. Эй, вы слишите? Они еще и разговаривают! Они... оно... Ай, эта штука живая! Прочь, прочь из моей головы!"

languages.text: "Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the shivers. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"
languages.original_text: "Ууу... Мурашки по коже от этих жутких фигур. Эй, вы слышите? Они еще и разговаривают! Они... оно... Ай, эта штука живая! Прочь, прочь из моей головы!"

traits.locale_text: "Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the chills. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"

"Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the shivers. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"
"Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the shivers. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"
"Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the shivers. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"

languages.text: «Caray... Esas piezas de juego me producen escalofríos. Eh, ¿oís eso? ¡Están hablando! Están... ¡demonios, esa cosa está viva! ¡Fuera! ¡Salid de mi cabeza!».
languages.original_text: "Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the shivers. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"

traits.locale_text: «Caray... Esas piezas de juego me producen escalofríos. Eh, ¿oís eso? ¡Están hablando! Están... ¡demonios, esa cosa está viva! ¡Fuera! ¡Salid de mi cabeza!».

languages.text: 「ふう...あの不気味なゲームの駒たちにはゾッとするわね。ねえ、聞こえた？こいつら、言葉すらしゃべるじゃない！こいつらは...これは...ああ、こいつは生きている！出て行って！私の頭から出て行け！」
languages.original_text: "Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the shivers. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"

traits.locale_text: 「ふう...あの不気味なゲームの駒たちにはゾッとするわね。ねえ、聞こえた？こいつら、言葉すらしゃべるじゃない！こいつらは...これは...ああ、こいつは生きている！出て行って！私の頭から出て行け！」

languages.text: “呃……那些吓人的棋子让我不寒而栗。嘿，你能听到吗？它们甚至还会说话！它们……它——哇啊，这玩意儿是活的！快滚！滚出我的脑袋！”
languages.original_text: "Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the shivers. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"

traits.locale_text: “呃……那些吓人的棋子让我不寒而栗。嘿，你能听到吗？它们甚至还会说话！它们……它——哇啊，这玩意儿是活的！快滚！滚出我的脑袋！”

languages.text: « Oooh... Ces pions sont vraiment affreux, ils me donnent des frissons. Hé, vous entendez ça ? Ils parlent ! Ils... euh... Ce truc est vivant ! Sortez ! Sortez de ma tête ! »
languages.original_text: "Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the shivers. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"

traits.locale_text: « Oooh... Ces pions sont vraiment affreux, ils me donnent des frissons. Hé, vous entendez ça ? Ils parlent ! Ils... euh... Ce truc est vivant ! Sortez ! Sortez de ma tête ! »

languages.text: "Puh ... Diese gruseligen Spielfiguren jagen mir eine Gänsehaut über den Rücken. Hey, könnt Ihr das hören? Die sprechen sogar! Sie ... es ... oje, das Ding lebt! Raus hier! Raus aus meinem Kopf!"
languages.original_text: "Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the shivers. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"

traits.locale_text: "Puh ... Diese gruseligen Spielfiguren jagen mir eine Gänsehaut über den Rücken. Hey, könnt Ihr das hören? Die sprechen sogar! Sie ... es ... oje, das Ding lebt! Raus hier! Raus aus meinem Kopf!"

languages.text: "Ay... Şu tuhaf parçalar tüylerimi diken diken ediyor. Baksana, duydun mu? Konuşuyorlar bir de! Onlar... Bu... Bu şey yaşıyor! Çık! Çık kafamın içinden!"
languages.original_text: "Hoo... Those creepy game pieces give me the shivers. Hey, can you hear that? They're even talking! They— it— gah, this thing's alive! Get out! Get out of my head!"

traits.locale_text: "Ay... Şu tuhaf parçalar tüylerimi diken diken ediyor. Baksana, duydun mu? Konuşuyorlar bir de! Onlar... Bu... Bu şey yaşıyor! Çık! Çık kafamın içinden!"
